EmailTemplate.name: 201908_Global_Email_GoDirect_BGA_MC.201908_Email1_GoDirect_BGA_MC
EmailTemplate.subject: {{company.Company Name:default=Your Company}} & Honeywell Aerospace
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Hi, {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}} Tired of using multiple tools for flight planning? Wish you could access all your routes from a laptop, ipad or datalink messaging? My name is Maggie Deane with Honeywell Aerospace. We provide organizations like {{lead.Company Name:default=yours}} with flight services products that make your life as a Chief Pilot much easier. Our easy to use software makes it easy to view available routes; create, optimize, and file a flight plan in just minutes. Plus, our experienced flight dispatchers are standing by 24/7, available to help anytime. Check out how it works and find out how you can save time here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/services/aerospace-services/flight-planning?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_godirectflight_bga&utm_term=email1]]>. I’d love to learn more about {{lead.Company Name:default=your company}}’s flight planning challenges and how Honeywell Aerospace can help. Do you have 15 minutes to jump on a call this week?
Dedicated to your success,
Maggie Deane Specialist - Inside Sales GoDirect Mobile: 480-225-9416 Email: Maggie.deane@honeywell.com <[[mailto:Maggie.deane@honeywell.com]]>
